name: Floating Princess
description:
Controls

  • Arrow keys: movement
  • Space bar: jump/float

A while ago, I wanted to do a little game jam, however there were no jams happening that piqued my interest. So, i decided to just make something in a weekend by myself. This project was made in 2 days. 

The game is very short, I focused on adding mechanics to make up many levels, but lacked the time to set up many levels.
